paper.title: Optimization of Smart Choice of Shares Portfolio Using Artificial Intelligence
paper.abstract: In this paper, we present an approach for optimal portfolio choice. This approach is divided into two parts: The first part is to select from an initial portfolio, the relevants shares that have a positive influence on the return and risk portfolio using regression neural networks, i.e: The shares have a low risks and high returns. These shares will built a sub portfolio. In the second part, we seek the proportions that optimize these sub the portfolio whose risk used is semi-variance using genetic algorithms. This approach allows to achieve a financial gain in terms of cost reduction and tax. In addition, a reduction in computational load during the optimization phase.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用回归神经网络和遗传算法来优化股票投资组合的选择和比例分配，旨在提高回报并降低风险，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
